# Objective

The objective of the project is to propose certain analytics to help policy makers to ensure future telecom development.

# Dataset 

* Macroeconomic indicators by coutry available at the World bank open data website  [http://data.worldbank.org](http://data.worldbank.org),

* ITU data on telecom uptake time series by country [http://www.itu.int/en/ITU-D/Statistics/Pages/stat/default.aspx] (http://www.itu.int/en/ITU-D/Statistics/Pages/stat/default.aspx). The data available covers 15 years, and more than 200 countries per indicator,

* Google broadband pricing data at [https://policybythenumbers.googleblog.com](https://policybythenumbers.googleblog.com), available for 3/4 years.

# Analytics

The analysys of these data will allow policy makers to:

* undertand the relation between the ITU telecom indicators and certain macroeconomic measures, and its efect on broadband prices among different countries,  

* predict the telecom situation in the future and make investment decision in the present that would ensure telecom development in certain countries.
